name: Pair of Winter Olympic Bandits - Multi
description: Now, raccoons like these aren't known for their speed or agility, but they are surprisingly strong skiers. Whenever they're carrying out a heist, they keep their equipment stored somewhere close to ensure a swift, unproblematic getaway. When they're not stealing jam from pantries or hats that belong to unassuming hedgehogs, you can find them fully embracing the off-piste lifestyle or even competing in a slalom race.
